subject: Cage Cleaners and Patch Monsters
body:
I've added lists of names to RESPONSIBLE_PARTIES based on work that 
people are already doing. If your name has been added, you can take a 
look at docs/roles_responsibilities.pod to see if you want to accept the 
responsibility. If I missed your name and it should have been added, 
drop me a note.

Thanks,
Allison
